appDesc.message: Save a list of all open tabs into a text file.

optionsFormatCustomDescription.message:
You can define a custom format instead of the default "Include titles" one.

You can use any combination of characters and the following special blocks:

  • {title}: title of a tab
  • {url}: URL of a tab
  • \r\n: new line

Example: [{title}]({url})\r\n

optionsIgnoreNonHTTPDescription.message: This option prevent Export Tabs URLs from listing tabs whose URL scheme is different from http:// or https://.

copiedToClipboard.message: The list has successfully been copied to your clipboard.

notCopiedToClipboard.message: An error has occured while trying to copy the list to your clipboard.
